attributes.action: Equal rights-Fight to protect a child!! dont fight to be in a child's life
attributes.additional_details: Domestic abuse is already supported with women and children No support is offered to men going through domestic abuse from woman and his children used as weapons. Make it a requirement to prove a parent unfit by court order. Child/ parent needs/risk assements with tasks/improvements to adhere to in everyones best interests! prioritising a childs growth and emotional wellbeing. Legal enforce payment agreements discussed based on capability/affordability of both parents. Allow flexibility
attributes.background: Childmaintinance claim to be by legal referral ONLY!Both parents to attend mediation after a family break down. Child's needs assessed/prevent controlling behaviour from either parent.Regular assessments to support where necessary. Those who can be amicable can declare agreement and sign closure
